title: cidambarEshvaram cintayAmi
sahitya:
cidambarEshvaram cintayAmi shrI shivAnanda gangAdharam mrgadharam


anupallavi

 cidAnanda naTana prakAsham shivakAmavallI manah priyakaram


caraNam   vAsuki pramukhAdyu pAsitam vAsudEva guruguhAdi vanditam 
bhaskara shashi shEkharam trinEtram bhinnaSadja rAganuta prasiddham
